title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 81 - Procedures Relating To Vehicle Dismantlers And Other Persons Engaged In The Transfer And Disposal Of Junk And Salvage Vehicles
content:

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 415-a[15], 424[1],429[1], [4], 430[1]-[2], 1224[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
